easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I am not a cat. I help you point where to go on a map. What am I?

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be.

hard.q: A box holds a clock, a key, and a leaf. The box is empty but full of time, memory, and life. What am I?
hard.hint: Think of something that contains stories and pages.
